# PAD::IS_USING_KEYBOARD_AND_MOUSE

## Summary
Returns true if the player is using keyboard and mouse controls

## Parameters
* **CONTROL_TYPE** control

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
control: unused parameter
